about_the_game:
About BMX Bastards

Get ready to master the streets and parks with BMX Bastards, an authentic BMX experience where every flip, grind, and manual feels just right. Whether you’re exploring massive urban environments or perfecting tricks in dedicated bike parks, BMX Bastards offers the freedom to ride your way.

Explore and Challenge Yourself

Hit the streets or dive into custom parks as you progress through varied terrains and challenges. The game currently features three unique maps, including a sprawling open-world environment with more parks and expansions to come. You can pull off aerial tricks, grinds, flips, and manuals with precise bike physics that capture the thrill of BMX riding.

Customize Your Ride and Character

Your BMX, your rules. The Bike Editor lets you fully customize your bike, from color schemes to components, including the option to ride a mountain bike (MTB). And with the Character Editor, you can style your rider with different clothing and gear options to match your vibe.

What’s Next?

As the game evolves in Early Access, expect exciting new features like multiplayer modes, a park editor where you can build and share your custom creations, and even more customization options. Regular updates will bring fresh content and improvements, fueled by feedback from the community.

Are you ready to join the world of BMX Bastards and become the ultimate rider?

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD HD6850
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
